pkgmetadata.longdescription: Explicitly Qualifying Namespaces by Automatically Adding 'pkg::' to Functions // Automatically adding 'pkg::' to a function, i.e. mutate() becomes dplyr::mutate(). It is up to the user to determine which packages should be used explicitly, whether to include base R packages or use the functionality on selected text, a file, or a complete directory. User friendly logging is provided in the 'RStudio' Markers pane. Lives in the spirit of 'lintr' and 'styler'.
